location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government, dated 16, and 17 January 1811, which provided William Bruce with instructions for forwarding a number of packets. The letter notes that the aforementioned packets have been passed on the Lieutenant Henry Willock, who has forwarded them direct to their intended recipients.
